"A.P.238/4/9/11:30": "Wow, that's amazing! Fighting with you has given me a chance to see just how strong you've gotten."
"Looks like I was right all along!"
"I was the one who pointed out how strong <%me> was as a new recruit. Don't take credit for my observation."
"But I guess it's like Patty says, you wouldn't know unless you saw it in person."
"I wonder why I never had this overwhelming feeling before."
"You're going to grow fast! Like a warrior! Yeah, that's really cool!"
"Hahahaha! Hey there, participants! I hope you're enjoying yourselves!"
"Huey, Huey! I want to take part too! Let me join in!"
"You're part of the staff... Ahem... time to report the current standing!"
"...Right now, the pair in the lead is the Hunter Ohza and the Force Marlu!"
"But it seems like <%me> and the rumored Information Sisters are also working hard!"
"Oh, I think I've heard that name before..."
"Nonetheless, it's neck-and-neck! The ARKS Battle Championship is a fierce struggle! The tide could turn at any moment!"
"Hey, Huey. Aren't you just reading from your notes? How's that fun?"
"The second half of the game begins here, so we expect you to do your best! That's all!"
"Look here, Claris Claes, this is about the participants, so can you please read it properly in future?"
"Hey! Did you hear that, Tea?! The \"rumored Information Sisters\"! We're a rumor!"
"Yeah yeah, calm down. That doesn't mean we're any more popular. Honestly."
